chapter.heading: Local Levy and Collection of Taxes

section.heading: Withholding or revocation of municipal or district health department license or permit for failure to pay taxes or water, sewer or sanitation charges

content.p: of section12-41, or any district health department, formed under chapter 368f, may withhold or revoke any license or permit, issued by such municipality or district health department, to operate a business enterprise if any taxes or water, sewer or sanitation charges levied by a water pollution control authority or such municipality or, in the case of a district department of health, by any constituent municipality of such district, against any property owned by or used in such business enterprise are delinquent and have been so delinquent for a period of not less than one year.
